item.title: Alexa kinda blows nowâ€¦.
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
So I'm a whore for learning about what kind of ranking my empire of websites rank, so I've been using Alexa for quite some time to learn exactly that. Recently this cute little image started showing up on Alexa's web search page.
Giving us a new era of a half-way decent product merged with a crappy one. Sigh. And all of this to spite Google? Well guys (Alexa and Windows Live) I'm not liking what I'm seeing. First off the system seems dog slow. Then I tried four queries, 2 of them returned this page.
Ewww....what the hell is this Technorati? Here's hoping Alexa and it's new unholy union get's it's act together before someone comes in and crushes them.
